phone_toy.title: phone toy
phone_toy.description: A fun and interactive phone toy with lights and sounds. Great for imaginative play and early learning. Safe, colorful, and easy to use for toddlers.

car_toy.title: car toy
car_toy.description: A durable and fun toy car designed for little hands. Perfect for encouraging imaginative play, coordination, and hours of racing fun.

elephant_.title: elephant
elephant_.description: This elephant toy is the perfect playmate for hugs, giggles, and tiny adventures.

ps_controller.title: Ps controller
ps_controller.description: A kid-friendly PlayStation-style controller with lights and buttons. Perfect for pretend play and developing motor skills — just like the real thing, made for little gamers!

rubik's_cube.title: Rubik's cube
rubik's_cube.description: A classic brain-teasing puzzle that challenges logic, memory, and problem-solving. Fun, compact, and perfect for all ages!

lego.title: Lego
lego.description: Creative, colorful bricks that inspire imagination and hands-on fun. Build, play, and explore endless possibilities — one block at a time!

ferrari_car_toy.title: Ferrari Car Toy
ferrari_car_toy.description: A sleek, high-speed replica designed for little racers. Stylish, durable, and perfect for fast-paced fun and imagination on the go!

teddy_bear_.title: Teddy Bear
teddy_bear_.description: Soft, cuddly, and always ready for hugs. A classic companion for comfort, playtime, and bedtime snuggles.
